title: Developer Workshop - Building Applications on Astra with BetterBotz (5/20)
description:
Apache Cassandra™ is a scalable NoSQL database that many leading companies turn to when dealing with challenging workloads. This online workshop will cover the most fundamental concepts and features of Apache Cassandra™, making sure you have the understanding needed to start your new path developing with Cassandra! You’ll also get to see underneath the hood of DataStax AstraDB, our Cassandra-as-a-Service offering with a built-in FREE forever tier and REST API.

See how to lay the foundation for your online ordering application, create a database in the cloud with AstraDB, and learn how to retrieve the data that you want to view.

MATERIALS:
https://katacoda.com/datastax/courses/astra-core-course/

THE SCENARIO
Meet BetterBotz. Better Botz believes that robots can help improve the health, prosperity, and wellbeing of human beings across the world. The company seeks to build Better Botz for a better future.

Better Botz needs a simple application to replace their online ordering platform for accepting orders. Better Botz is so focused on designing and building robots that they don’t have time to build the ordering application - that’s where you step in to:

- Review the available data and create a database to store the data
- Generate two tables that are crucial to solving this problem
- Dig deeper into different data sets and expand our application, integrating different technologies as we go
